Enum IntEnum
============
* List of finite choices
* Enumerations
* ``IntEnum``
* ``Flag``

Enum StrEnum
============
* List of finite choices
* Enumerations with str values
* ``StrEnum``

=========
* Automatically generated value
* ``auto()``
